original_text: Today you are asking us questions about the good thing that we did for this man. Before that, he could not walk. You are asking us how we caused his legs to become strong.
korean_text: 만일 병자에게 행한 착한 일에 대하여 이 사람이 어떻게 구원을 받았느냐고 오늘 우리에게 질문한다면

sentences.original_text: Today you are asking us questions
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 당신은 우리에게 질문을 하고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: about the good thing that we did
Before that, he could not walk
You are asking us how we caused his legs
